Seating

Choose from our selection of

luxuriously comfortable seating options

Seats Designed for Maximum Comfort

Armchair (Seats 1)

Our single seats are cosy armchairs, perfect for sinking into while watching your favourite films. Seats are separated by side tables where you can rest your food and drinks during the movie. Armchairs can be booked on the ground floor (all cinemas) and balcony (Rathmines) Most of our seats are armchairs so selecting this option will give more availability. Seating style differs by location.

Couch (Seats 2)

Our couches are spacious and perfect for couples. Couches are separated by side tables where you can rest your food and drinks during the movie. Couches are available on the ground level (all cinemas) and balcony level (Rathmines) There are a limited number of couch seats so they may not be available for your chosen screening.

Bed (Seats 2)

Beds are available to book in Rathmines only where there are 5 comfy double beds lining the front row of the auditorium. Beds allow you to lie back and watch your film in maximum comfort. Please note, the beds are in the front row and therefore close to the screen.

Find out venue-specific information by clicking below

and selecting the cinema of your choice

Food & Drink

Enjoy delectable food and drinks during your movie

or drink and dine before or after your film at one of our onsite bars and restaurants.

Delicious Menu Options for Everyone

Pre-Order

Beat the queues! Pre-order food and drinks while booking your tickets online (Rathmines Only.) Just select the items you want from the drop-down list, after you choose your seats. Pre-Orders will be dropped directly to your seat, so there’s no need to queue at the bar.

Order On The Day

Not sure what you’d like in advance? No problem! Order from our full selection of hot food, drinks and snacks at the foyer bar when you arrive for your screening. We recommend arriving at least 20 minutes before your film start time to ensure you have time to place your order and take your seat.

Make a Night of It

Make the most of your Stella experience and book a table at one of our onsite bars/restaurants for before or after your film. Choose your cinema location to find out what’s available and plan your evening.

Find out venue specific information by clicking below

and selecting the cinema of your choice.

Spend Your Evening in One Venue With Bars and Restaurants Onsite

Stella Cocktail Club

A Beautiful Art Deco Cocktail Bar Serving Delicious Drinks and Food 7 Days a Week

With Quality, Locally Sourced Produce at Its Core, the Seasonal Menu Offers Something for Everyone.
